51805.「上デキだ。実感ねえとは思うが\n 紫光石は 女神さんのとこへ捧げられたぜ。:
It's a top-decker. I know you don't realize
it, but the Purple Gem was dedicated to the
Goddess.

51806.「さあて 次へ行くか。\n 女神さんに 祈る番だぜ。:
Well, let's move on. It's my turn to pray to
the Goddess.

51810.<center>六聖陣によって チカラを解放されし者たちが\n聖戦を戦い それぞ:
Those who were freed from their power by the
Six Saints fought holy wars to protect the
peace of their respective eras.

51811.<center>今 魔瘴が かつてない大きなうねりを見せ\nアストルティアは こ:
Now, demon miasma has reached unprecedented
proportions, and Astoltia is entering an era
of unprecedented turmoil.

51813.<center>解放されしチカラを奮い そなたにも\nこの大いなる聖戦に 加わっ:
I ask you to join me in this great crusade
with your unleashed strength.

51814.<center>悪しき者たちとの戦いに身を投じ\nこの世界を守った\nかつての闘:
Like the fighters of the past who defended
this world against the evil ones...
